definition: A textile floor covering typically used to enhance the aesthetics and comfort of indoor spaces, often found in living rooms, bedrooms, or other areas of a home or building. It is commonly made of woven or tufted fabric, and serves as a decorative element while providing insulation and noise reduction.

examples.german: Ich habe einen Teppich im Wohnzimmer.
examples.english: I have a carpet in the living room.
The carpet floor is very soft.

examples.german: Mein Hund liegt gerne auf dem Teppich.
examples.english: My dog likes to lie on the carpet.

examples.german: Der Teppich muss regelmäßig gesaugt werden.
examples.english: The carpet needs to be vacuumed regularly.
